title: Agri-tech firm Gramophone plans to double headcount to 1,000 in 6-8 months - Business Standard
content: Agri-tech firm Gramophone plans to double headcount to 1,000 in 6-8 months  Business Standard
description: The company whose current employee strength is over 450 is planning to add over 300 professionals across technology, product, operations and marketing in the next six-eight months, Gramophone said
